snippet: The Obama administration and Congress must do better to assure that migrants who fear persecution are given careful consideration.
abstract: Editorial contends immigration crisis involving influx of Central American migrants at Texas border has receded but has not ended, though it has been hidden from public view; notes thousands of children remain in courtrooms and detention centers, and for most part lack legal support; calls for United States to provide support and careful consideration to such immigrant children, many of whom legitimately fear persecution at home.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration and Congress must do better to assure that migrants who fear persecution are given careful consideration.

headline.seo: Immigrants from Central America Need Legal Support
